Some context on the original singer: They are a Hong Kong rock band named 'Beyond' and was most popular during the 80's and 90's. Unfortunately, in 1993 their lead vocalist, Wong Ka Kui (黃家駒), passed away after accidentally falling off the stage on a Japanese game show, resulting in a coma and eventually led to his death. Despite all these years, Beyond still remains as one the most influential music artists in not only Hong Kong, but also the rest of Asia.
